Details: Due to the nature of the project, details will only be disclosed during interviews
Worked with the Unreal Engine Game Animation Sample Project to implement new mechanics.
Created procedural animations to blend the existing animations with new third party ones.
Collaborated with others to expand an existing Unity codebase
Revamped the basic player movement controls to one that is more scalable with the amount of player actions
Implemented various talent trees and skills that the player can use
Provided guidance to students in physics and programming; facilitating them in strategic thinking and motivating them to grow.
Supporting students facing academic difficulties by offering targeted support and resources to help them improve their performance.
Created and maintained an open and judgment-free study environment, encouraging students to express their thoughts freely in collaborations & discussions without fear of criticism.
Implementing strategies through development of demonstrations, showcasing various Unity’s VR capabilities.
Reporting test results to help assist educators via online presentations using effective communication skills.
Worked with VR equipment and Unity’s XR Interaction Toolkit, ensuring software optimization and enhanced experience for users.
Designed, wrote and tested code using C# to program physics based interactions allowing integration between the user and virtual objects.
